mapper.select: select count(*) from interface_logs l left join interfaces i on l.interface_id = i.id left join callers c on l.caller_code = c.`code` left join states s on l.state = s.id where ('all' = #{interfaceName} or i.`name` = #{interfaceName}) and ('all' = #{department} or c.department = #{department}) and l.request_start_time >= #{requestStartTime} and l.request_end_time <= #{requestEndTime} and ('all' = #{state} or l.state = #{state})

select i.`name`, s.state, c.department, l.execute_start_time executeStartTime, l.execute_end_time executeEndTime, (l.execute_end_time - l.execute_start_time)elapsedTime from interface_logs l left join callers c on l.caller_code = c.`code` left join interfaces i on l.interface_id = i.id left join states s on l.state = s.id where ('all' = #{interfaceName} or i.`name` = #{interfaceName} ) and ('all' = #{department} or c.department = #{department}) and l.request_start_time >= #{requestStartTime} and l.request_end_time <= #{requestEndTime} and ('all' = #{state} or l.state = #{state}) order by l.request_start_time desc limit #{pagination}, #{pageSize};
